## EthersLiquity.getZUSDBalance() method

Get the amount of ZUSD held by an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getZUSDBalance(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                       | Description                                |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| address   | string                                                     | Address whose balance should be retrieved. |
| overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) |                                            |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt;
